page.title: 15TRADE IN GRAFFHAM
page.content: The pub sells alcohol & a range of food but scampi & chips is the most popular. They have 3 deliveries of beer a week & a barrel holds a gallon. They have 5 people working for them during the week & 3 at weekends. They get tourists & locals & have a beer garden. The garage sells petrol to 25 or 30 people a day. It sells 10 big cars & 40 small ones each year & are both new & secondhand. They service cats & lawnmowers. 1 third pay by cheque, a third by cash & a third on account. 1 person fills her Rolls Royce at the garage. The village shop & post office sells a wide variety of goods. They would not like another shop to open but would welcome more space.
